Tesla Releases Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Releases Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results Business Wire Jan 28, 2026 AUSTIN, Texas, January 28, 2026 – Tesla has released its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2025 by posting an update on its Investor Relations website. Please visit https://ir.tesla.com to view the update. As previously announced, Tesla management will host a live question and answer (Q&amp;A) webcast at 4:30 p.m. Central Time (5:30 p.m. Eastern Time) to discuss the results and outlook. What: &nbsp;Tesla Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results Q&amp;A Webcast When:&nbsp; Wednesday, January 28, 2026 Time: 4:30 p.m. Central Time / 5:30 p.m. Eastern Time Q4 &amp; FY 25 Update: https://ir.tesla.com Webcast: https://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) The webcast will be archived on the company’s website following the call. Investor Relations Contact: ir@tesla.com Footer Tesla © 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
